item.title: Fun with Cloudflare Zero Trust
item.description: Cloudflare Zero Trust to create a SWG (Secure Web Gateway) and CASB (Cloud Access Security Broker) where I can enforce access, acceptable use and device posture policies

item.title: Pair Blogging: The Epoch
item.description: Episode #1 in a series of conversations between Vito Chin and Allen Ding about technology, culture, and life.
